column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We got one sausage and pepperoni deep dish pizzas. They were pretty good... I would have preferred more flavor in the red sauce
column2: especially since the top layer was drowning in sauce. I also would have preferred if the flavors of the pepperoni and sausage shone through the sauce more. Otherwise
column4: and the bottom cheese layer was quite delicious.
